title: You’re Beautiful (Interlude)
lyrics:
“You’re Beautiful” is the twenty-second track off of OutKast’s 2006 album, Idlewild.

It features R&B songstress Alicia Keys as the woman Andre is complimenting.
(Alicia Keys)
So, how would I look laid out on a table, huh? Come on, tell me
(Andre 3000)
I don't know...well, you wouldn't take much
(Alicia Keys)
Yeah?
(Andre 3000)
You're beautiful
(Alicia Keys)
You really think so?
(Andre 3000)
'Bout the most beautiful thing I've seen in Idlewild. But then, you're not from Idlewild
